mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.NAME FROM ums_role_resource_relation a JOIN ums_resource b ON a.resource_id = b.id WHERE a.role_id = $ {roleId}

SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.url, c.category_id, c.description FROM ums_admin_role_relation a LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource c ON b.resource_id = c.id WHERE a.admin_id = ${adminId}
SELECT c.* FROM ums_admin_role_relation a LEFT JOIN ums_role_menu_relation b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_menu c ON b.menu_id = c.id WHERE a.admin_id = ${adminId}
